name: The Zone (TreiberGames)
description:
In The Zone the goal is to protact the area (hexagon in the middle of the screen) from nasty enemys. The area has three lives everytime a enemy reaches the area you it loses one lives, if you lose all of them you are GameOver. You can protact the area by shooting at the enemys or simply drive over them. But there are three typs of enemys you have to worry about:

TheFirst typ:
The first typ is a simple enemy, he trys to reach the area and you can kill him in a cool explosion with one shot.

The Second typ:
The second enemy is pretty much like the first with one diffrence it has a shield wich sometimes protects him from getting shot by you.

The third typ:
The third typ dosent try to reach the area, he searches for a random spot on the map and if he found his spot he will settle donw and start shooting at the area.

Controls:

Shooting;
Just point at with you mouse couser where you want to shoot and press the left mouse button.

Moveing:
hold down left mouse button and start dragging, the character will follow you.

I hope you have fun playing the game and if ypu do or have any feedback just leave a comment and I will see what i can do for you:)
and if you want more details about the game or want to ask my a question check out the linke below.

all the best and thank you for playing,
